text: 41 Let I;(n)be the number of positions on the board that are not threatened by any queen {12 that has already been placed in node n Let g(n) be equal to the depth of node n Perform an A* search to find a solution path from the start state to a goal state You have to indicate the order in which nodes are expanded, showing the OPEN queue after each step, as well as the g, hand f values of every expanded node Use the node numbers provided in the picture
